$(NVCC) model/roi_pooling.cu -c -arch=sm_52 -Xcompiler -fPIC -x cu -o _ext.o

body:
Currently for building a CUDA extension I'm calling `torch.utils.ffi.create_extension` and it suffices. Would I be able to do without `setup.py` and have similar lines in Makefile?

```shell
$(NVCC) model/roi_pooling.cu -c -arch=sm_52 -Xcompiler -fPIC -x cu -o _ext.o
python -c "import os, torch.utils.ffi; torch.utils.ffi.create_extension('_ext.RoiPooling', headers = ['roi_pooling.h'], sources = ['roi_pooling.cpp'], define_macros = [], relative_to = 'model/__init__.py', with_cuda = True, extra_link_args = [os.path.abspath('_ext.o')]).build()"
```
